logoAltText: Logo of the European Tchoukball Championships 2026. Contains the text “Euro Tchoukball Switzerland 2026”

home.intro: The {formattedEtc} is a competition of the {formattedFitb} (FITB), supervised by the {formattedEtbf} (ETBF).
home.bidWon: {formattedSwissTchoukball} has {wonWithLinkToNews} the bid to host the event in 2026.

location.title: Location
location.description: The {eventName} will take place in {locationName}, Switzerland. The town is home to a {nationalSportsCenterLink} with professional sports facilities, the {federalOfficeOfSportLink} and the {swissFederalInstituteOfSportLink}.

sportTotoHall.title: Sport-Toto hall
sportTotoHall.description: Triple hall that will be the main court of the competition.

oldSportsHall.title: Old sports hall
oldSportsHall.description: Large hall that will be used as the second court for the competition.

trainingHall.title: Training hall
trainingHall.description: New hall built specifically for training purposes. It will be the third court.
